summary: A female Imperial savegame before Helgen keep, level 1.
descriptionHtml:
This is a character I made with a performer bardic-type theme in mind.  She has coppery hair and lovely green eyes, and the look of a daydreamer. 

To install: Extract the .ess file into your Saves folder. This is usually located in C:\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves. From the Skyrim in-game menu, Load. 
To uninstall: Delete it.

The save was taken after the dragon attack, immediately before the choice to follow Ralof or Hadvar into the keep.

Please enjoy, and constructive feedback is always welcomed. This is my first uploaded creation.

In order for her to look exactly like the screenshots you may need to install:

Xenius Character Enhancement: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
Younger Females: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3227
Beauty faces for females: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329
Eyebrows Match Hair: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=627
author: lizarosa
